channel.title: Immigration and shit
channel.description:
"There is no such thing as illegal immigrants, only illegal governments." -some dude from India
Thoughts?

item.title: Immigration and shit
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
It’s quite simple, because of cheap labor and lack of worker protections, Mexican workers produce goods more cheaply than US workers. Because of NAFTA, American companies can outsource production to cheap Mexican labor. This has the effect of A) screwing up the Mexican economy because they are all production and no consumption. B) making Mexican workers want to work in the US for higher wages, C) screwing up the US economy because we don’t produce anything, so immigrants have nowhere to work when they get here.

Obvious solution - penalties on companies for outsourcing labor, making it economical to produce domestically, which is what NAFTA eliminated.

Read full topic

item.title: Immigration and shit
item.dc:creator: DansonDelta40
item.description:
Burbinator:

Any “democratic” government with values of freedom and equality would be completely hypocritical to refuse to allow people in.

As far as I know, Germany is the only Nation in Europe that lets in large numbers of immigrants, and that only because WE HAVE TO.

We are the evil children of Nazis, remember? So we have to do whatever those that were once allied against us ask of us. It’s part of our unconditional capitulation from back in 1945.

All other countries - France, Great Britain, Austria, Italy… restrict immigration much more heavily than Germany. As do the USA. Don’t even start to talk about Switzerland.

And German politicians would LOVE to do that as well. They simply cannot. They MUST let them in. Otherwise we are “ze evil dshermans” again.

Face it: Every “democratic” government with values of freedom and equality on this planet IS (!) hypocritical.

Read full topic

item.title: Immigration and shit
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
Apparently no one read the quote in the OP. Only nutsack said something along those lines.

And I agree with him. The concept of illegal immigrants is backwards and elitist to the extreme, in my opinion. Any “democratic” government with values of freedom and equality would be completely hypocritical to refuse to allow people in.
People have migrated for as long as the human race has existed, and only in the past few hundred years we have started refusing people entrance.

There’s only a tiny percentage of migrants actually coming to the west, anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Immigration and shit
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
I like how a couple of people’s racist undertones actually manage to pop up a bit.

But yeah illegal immigration is, well illegal. I haven’t met any but I’m sure they are people too and not stereotypical “fencejumpers”. I don’t have much to say on the topic since I don’t know much about it but that’s my 0.002 cents.

item.title: Immigration and shit
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93

danielsangeo:

… Heavily prosecute businesses and people that hire illegal immigrants. And I do mean heavily. If a business is found to be employing illegal labor, they’re automatically fined $5,000 a day…per person. If they don’t stop the practice of illegal labor, their business license is revoked.

Illegal immigration problem? WHAT illegal immigration problem? You’d have to erect a fence to keep the illegal immigrants IN the country.

I take back every bad thing I ever EVER said about you.

item.title: Immigration and shit
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I’m reminded of something that happened to John McCain on the campaign trail. He claimed that immigrants do jobs that Americans don’t want to do. He said something along the lines of, “I couldn’t get an American to pick apples, even at $50/hour.” Right after he said that, his office was bombarded with calls from Americans that wanted to pick apples for John McCain for $50/hour.

I never laughed so hard in my life.

My view on illegal immigration is that it is a symptom of a problem. Treating the symptom does not solve the problem. My plan to solve the problem of illegal immigration would be dismissed with either laughter or anger by those that claim to hate illegal immigration: Heavily prosecute businesses and people that hire illegal immigrants. And I do mean heavily. If a business is found to be employing illegal labor, they’re automatically fined $5,000 a day…per person. If they don’t stop the practice of illegal labor, their business license is revoked.

Illegal immigration problem? WHAT illegal immigration problem? You’d have to erect a fence to keep the illegal immigrants IN the country.

Read full topic

item.description:
I get extremely pissed off when people say “those illegal immigrants are taking up all our jobs and ruining our economy!!”

The jobs that those illegal immigrants take? Ones that the average American would never do, for 10x less than its worth. They BENEFIT the economy, and we’re discriminating against them.

item.title: Immigration and shit
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
I will be kind to those that get here via lawful means.

All else can wipe my arse with their tongues.

Yes… I am serious.

:pointedly looks at the Mexican family that lives behind her of which they make a point of irritating ALL neighbors with the 2:30 am mariachi music and “how can you possibly have 6 children in a 2 bedroom home!?!” with the audacity of throwing rocks at my dog to the point of breaking his teeth because he thinks he is ‘fetching’; and cry’s racism when I yell and get pissed that they sit on my fence taunting my pets":

sigh

I will get over this anger. I will. I need to be more tolerant. I do. I really do. :breaths a ten second timeout:

Read full topic
